divs: Sighting DetailsI have just recently purchased night vision monocular and thought i would try it out on the night sky.I had been looking up close to the plough when i saw 4 bright orbs moving along the night sky,at first i though i was cloud movement but the 4 objects moved out of my field of view and seemed to be very high and moving fast.All of a sudden the light broke formation and 2 of them were circling the other 2.Then the other 2 moved behind the first 2 and they formed a line and moved away in the night sky at a speed faster than a sattelite moves,i called my wife but by the time she came out of our house they had gone.We continued to watch the sky for about 10 minutes when we both saw a very bright light (orb moving accross the sky at a very fast speed,. there was no way this was a plane or sattelite and we heard no noise at all.My wife was astounded at what we both had just seen together without night vision.The area that we live is very quiet relating to commercial airlines and we can always distinguish planes or helicopters by the noise and lights they emit.I just wish i had time to have got my camera to capture the single UFO on film.I dont think i would have been able to capture the first objects on film as they were a lot higher and only visible using night vision.
Summary: Just got my night vision today tried it out and after about 20 minutes I could not believe what I saw.
